agendaItems.title: Confirmation of the Minutes of 30th and 31st (Special) Board of Governors Meeting of NIT Agartala.
Action taken on the decision of the 30th and 31st (Special) Board of Governors meeting held on May 02, 2014 and November 07, 2014 respectively at NIT Agartala.
To consider the abroad visit by the faculty members under the CPDA and TEQIP-II.
To consider the recommendations of the minutes of 32nd Building & Works Committee meeting of NIT Agartala.
To consider the Audit Report of the accounts of the Institute for the year 2013-14.
To consider the Annual Report for the year 2013-14.
To consider the extension of official tenure of Prof. (Dr.) R. P. Sharma as the Dean (Academic) of NIT Agartala.
To consider the report of Fact Finding Committee on the incident of December 04, 2013 due to sad demise of Rahul Kumar, a 2nd year student of ECE Department, NIT Agartala.
Providing of increment due to enhancement of Grade Pay to the up-graded faculty members from GP Rs. 6000/- to Rs. 7000/-.
To consider modification in the existing rules for allotment of residential accommodation at campus of NIT Agartala.
Consideration and approval of 100% waving of tuition fee for the SC/ST students studying in M.Tech, Dual degree and Ph.D programme at NIT Agartala.
To consider the recommendations of the minutes of 25th Finance Committee meeting of NIT Agartala, held on January 17, 2015.
Security Threat in NIT Agartala and measure thereof.
To establish Industry-Academy Partnership with Bosch.
Present Status of TEQIP-II Project of NIT Agartala.
Any other item with permission of the Chair.

subItems.title: Service matter of Dr. Umesh Mishra, Professor, Civil Engineering Department, NIT Agartala.
To consider the estimate for Construction of Central Lecture Hall Complex having 27 Class Rooms at NIT Agartala at a cost of Rs.70,52,95,723.00.
Opening of a new M. Tech. course on Construction Technology & Management in the Civil Engineering Department of NITA.
Extension of Contractual Services of Prof. Bidyut Kumar Bhattacharyya, Electrical Engineering Dept, NIT Agartala.
To consider promotion for Non-Teaching Group-C employees who are serving in NIT Agartala for a pretty long period.
To consider the Higher Grade Pay in respect of 6 (Six) nos. of Group-C Non-Teaching employee of NIT Agartala considering the MHRD letter vide No. F.23-18/ 2008-TS.II, dated 17-03-2010.
Empanelment of Health Care Institutes for the regular employees of NIT Agartala.
W. P. (C) 97 of 2013 filed by Dr. Prasun Chakraborti and 3 others and the Judgment passed by the Hon’ble High Court of Tripura.
PIRD Complaint against Prof. Probir Kumar Bose Ex-Director of NIT Agartala.
subItems.resolution: Fact Finding Committee to be constituted.

closingRemarks.conclusion: The Meeting ended with a vote of thanks to the Chair.
